name: Putrid Shark
description:
OUT FRIDAY, MAY 28th!

PUTRID SHARK is a game by Carly Besterman (@worsterman) featuring an original chiptune soundtrack by Putrid Shark (the band).

 Stream the first album by Putrid Shark on Bandcamp, coming soon.

Written & Developed:
Carly Besterman (@worsterman)

Music Team:
Charlotte Lillith
Deidra Skye (@deidraskye)
King Killjoy of Mount Misery (@pianovillain)
Raccoon Fink (@raccoonfink)
Raphaël Clément-Dorval (@aphalexmusic)
Sci-Fi Train Guy (sciencefictionboyfriend)
Supercomposite / Steph Maj Swanson (supercomposite)

Art Assets: 
MaterialFuture (itch.io)
PeterMilko (itch.io)
Rhysio  (itch.io)
Worsterman

Developed on GB Studio by Chris Maltby.
